snippet.title: PAKO 2 - Mobile Launch Trailer (iOS / Android)
snippet.description:
Now available for iOS in App Store and for Android in Google Play!
https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/pako-2/id1317692806?mt=8
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.treemengames.pako2

PAKO 2 is an arcade driving game where you work as a getaway driver. Pick up your crew from heist spot, escort them to safety in dramatic chase against the cops, repeat and compete in the leaderboards!  Every run gains you money which can be used to buy new rides and locations. Get in, get out, get paid!

Also available in Steam for PC/MAC
http://store.steampowered.com/app/612370/
